name: Vibin' Lizard Snack Bar - GMTKJam 2021
description:
Vibin' Lizard Snack Bar was made within a 48-hour timeframe for the 2021 GMTK Gamejam, under the theme of "Joined Together". In total, 28 hours went into making this game and all non-audio assets were created specifically for it.

As for the audio assets:

- Music has been sourced from Soundscrate

- Other sound effects are from Freesfx.co.uk or freesound.org, with mandatory attributions on the latter being:

- https://freesound.org/people/wertstahl/sounds/409263/

- https://freesound.org/people/FoolBoyMedia/sounds/264498/

- https://freesound.org/people/timgormly/sounds/170170/

When you're done playing the game, I'd love to hear your thoughts on it either here in the comments or on Twitter ^^

Known Bugs

- Sometimes the notifications will start bugging out and leave spaces in between them, but I put a bandaid on it so it is only limited to the current day.
